sentence:
• Shares of salesforce.com, inc. ( CRM ) declined 4.4% after the company projected third-quarter revenues between $2.11-$2.12 billion, below the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $2.13 billion
• Shares of Charter Communications, Inc. ( CHTR ) gained 4.5% on news that the company is due to become an S&P 500 component, replacing EMC Corporation ( EMC )
• Shares of Campbell Soup Company ( CPB ) tanked 6.3% after the company posted fourth-quarter fiscal 2016 earnings per share of $0.46 that fell short of the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.50
• Shares of Wal-Mart Stores, Inc. ( WMT ) advanced almost 2% after the company said that it will cut 7,000 back office jobs in order to make its stores more efficient
